languages.text: {n}Октавиана понижает голос.{/n} "Джай... знаете, Джай молодец. Сама себя на Футфоле сделала, выбралась из грязи в князи, неписаные правила соблюдает, слабых не топчет, да и пьет как рыба — как тут не зауважаешь. Только вот беда — похоже, впала в немилость к Владайму. А учитывая, что они... да, впрочем, мы все трое... имеем отношение к {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллике{/g} — пиши пропало. Лучше бы Джай убраться с Футфола, пока жива — пускай уж у нее бизнес отберут, а не жизнь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана понижает голос.{/n} "Джай... знаете, Джай молодец. Сама себя на Футфоле сделала, выбралась из грязи в князи, неписаные правила соблюдает, слабых не топчет, да и пьет как рыба — как тут не зауважаешь. Только вот беда — похоже, впала в немилость к Владайму. А учитывая, что они... да, впрочем, мы все трое... имеем отношение к Касбаллике — пиши пропало. Лучше бы Джай убраться с Футфола, пока жива — пускай уж у нее бизнес отберут, а не жизнь".

languages.text: {n}Octaviana drops her voice.{/n} "Jae... You know, Jae's pretty great. She's made a name for herself here on Footfall. She's a woman who came from nothing, she follows the unwritten rules of this place, she doesn't walk all over weaker folks, and she drinks like a fish to boot — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she's got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since both of them — well, I guess all three of us — have ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, there's no way out of this. Jae should get off Footfall while she still can — better to lose her business than her life."
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана понижает голос.{/n} "Джай... знаете, Джай молодец. Лучше бы Джай убраться с Футфола, пока жива — пускай уж у нее бизнес отберут, а не жизнь".

She made a name for herself here on Footfall, she's a woman who rose from nothing, follows unwritten rules, doesn't trample the weak, and drinks like a fish too — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since they... well, I guess all three of us... have ties to the Kasballica — it's a lost cause. Jae should get off Footfall while she can — better to have your business taken than your life."

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜压低了声音。{/n}“婕伊……说真的，婕伊真的很了不起，她已经在落脚港闯出了名声。她白手起家，遵守这个地方不成文的规定。她从来不在弱者身上占便宜，而且她喝起酒来像头牛一样，她身上有很多值得尊重的地方。遗憾的是，弗拉迪姆好像看她很不顺眼。既然他们两个，呃，算上我是三个人，都和{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}有联系，那这个问题恐怕没办法解决了。婕伊应该趁她还能走的时候，赶紧离开落脚港。丢了生意总比丢了性命要好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana drops her voice.{/n} "Jae... You know, Jae's pretty great. She's made a name for herself here on Footfall. She's a woman who came from nothing, she follows the unwritten rules of this place, she doesn't walk all over weaker folks, and she drinks like a fish to boot — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she's got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since both of them — well, I guess all three of us — have ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, there's no way out of this. Jae should get off Footfall while she still can — better to lose her business than her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜压低了声音。{/n}“婕伊……说真的，婕伊真的很了不起，她已经在落脚港闯出了名声。她白手起家，遵守这个地方不成文的规定。她从来不在弱者身上占便宜，而且她喝起酒来像头牛一样，她身上有很多值得尊重的地方。遗憾的是，弗拉迪姆好像看她很不顺眼。既然他们两个，呃，算上我是三个人，都和{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}有联系，那这个问题恐怕没办法解决了。婕伊应该趁她还能走的时候，赶紧离开落脚港。丢了生意总比丢了性命要好。”

languages.text: {n}Octaviana baja la voz.{/n} «Jae... Bueno, Jae es buena chica. Se ha forjado un nombre aquí en Paso desde lo más bajo. Jae se limita a seguir las normas no escritas del lugar, no se aprovecha de los más débiles, bebe como una manguera... Eso es digno de respeto. La única pega es que parece que no las tiene todas consigo con Vladaym. En cualquier caso, ya que ambos, bueno, nosotros tres, tenemos relación con la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, no hay solución. Jae deberá irse de Paso ahora que puede; mejor perder los negocios que perder su vida».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana drops her voice.{/n} "Jae... You know, Jae's pretty great. She's made a name for herself here on Footfall. She's a woman who came from nothing, she follows the unwritten rules of this place, she doesn't walk all over weaker folks, and she drinks like a fish to boot — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she's got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since both of them — well, I guess all three of us — have ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, there's no way out of this. Jae should get off Footfall while she still can — better to lose her business than her life."

Jae se limita a seguir las normas no escritas del lugar, no se aprovecha de los más débiles, bebe como una manguera... Eso es digno de respeto. La única pega es que parece que no las tiene todas consigo con Vladaym. En cualquier caso, ya que ambos, bueno, nosotros tres, tenemos relación con la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, no hay solución. Jae deberá irse de Paso ahora que puede; mejor perder los negocios que perder su vida».

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナは静かな声で話し始めた。{/n}「ジェイは…すごい奴だよ。彼女はここフットフォールで名を馳せている。何もないところから来た奴で、この場所の暗黙のルールを守り、弱い奴らにも優しいし、とんでもない酒豪だ。とにかく尊敬できるところがたくさんある。ただ、どうもヴラダイムに目をつけられちまったみたいなんだ。あの2人…あたしを入れて3人は…{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と繋がっているからどうにも身動きが取れない。ジェイはまだ間に合ううちにフットフォールから出ていったほうがいい。命を失うより、仕事を失ったほうがマシだろ」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana drops her voice.{/n} "Jae... You know, Jae's pretty great. She's made a name for herself here on Footfall. She's a woman who came from nothing, she follows the unwritten rules of this place, she doesn't walk all over weaker folks, and she drinks like a fish to boot — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she's got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since both of them — well, I guess all three of us — have ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, there's no way out of this. Jae should get off Footfall while she still can — better to lose her business than her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナは静かな声で話し始めた。{/n}「ジェイは…すごい奴だよ。彼女はここフットフォールで名を馳せている。何もないところから来た奴で、この場所の暗黙のルールを守り、弱い奴らにも優しいし、とんでもない酒豪だ。とにかく尊敬できるところがたくさんある。ただ、どうもヴラダイムに目をつけられちまったみたいなんだ。あの2人…あたしを入れて3人は…{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と繋がっているからどうにも身動きが取れない。ジェイはまだ間に合ううちにフットフォールから出ていったほうがいい。命を失うより、仕事を失ったほうがマシだろ」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana senkt ihre Stimme.{/n} "Jae ... also, Jae ist was Besonderes. Sie hat sich hier auf Footfall einen Namen gemacht. Sie ist aus dem Nichts gekommen, sie befolgt die ungeschriebenen Regeln hier, sie stellt sich nicht über Schwächere, und sie kann richtig gut trinken – all das verlangt Respekt. Das Traurige ist nur, dass sie sich anscheinend mit Vladaym angelegt hat. Und da sie beide – also, eigentlich wir alle drei – Verbindungen zur {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} unterhalten, gibt es da auch keinen Ausweg. Jae sollte Footfall verlassen, solange sie noch kann – besser ihr Geschäft verlieren als ihr Leben."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana drops her voice.{/n} "Jae... You know, Jae's pretty great. She's made a name for herself here on Footfall. She's a woman who came from nothing, she follows the unwritten rules of this place, she doesn't walk all over weaker folks, and she drinks like a fish to boot — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she's got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since both of them — well, I guess all three of us — have ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, there's no way out of this. Jae should get off Footfall while she still can — better to lose her business than her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana senkt ihre Stimme.{/n} "Jae ... also, Jae ist was Besonderes. Sie hat sich hier auf Footfall einen Namen gemacht. Sie ist aus dem Nichts gekommen, sie befolgt die ungeschriebenen Regeln hier, sie stellt sich nicht über Schwächere, und sie kann richtig gut trinken – all das verlangt Respekt. Das Traurige ist nur, dass sie sich anscheinend mit Vladaym angelegt hat. Und da sie beide – also, eigentlich wir alle drei – Verbindungen zur {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} unterhalten, gibt es da auch keinen Ausweg. Jae sollte Footfall verlassen, solange sie noch kann – besser ihr Geschäft verlieren als ihr Leben."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana baisse d'un ton.{/n} « Jae... Vous savez, Jae est vraiment quelqu'un de bien. Elle s'est fait un nom ici, à Castel. Elle est partie de rien, elle suit les règles tacites de l'endroit, elle ne s'en prend jamais aux plus faibles qu'elle, et en plus, elle a une descente incroyable... Franchement, elle mérite le respect. Mais malheureusement, elle a l'air de s'être attiré les foudres de Vladaym. Et puisque tous les deux... ou plutôt, tous les trois, on a des liens avec la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, elle est coincée. Jae devrait quitter Castel tant qu'elle le peut encore... Il vaut mieux perdre son business que la vie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana drops her voice.{/n} "Jae... You know, Jae's pretty great. She's made a name for herself here on Footfall. She's a woman who came from nothing, she follows the unwritten rules of this place, she doesn't walk all over weaker folks, and she drinks like a fish to boot — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she's got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since both of them — well, I guess all three of us — have ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, there's no way out of this. Jae should get off Footfall while she still can — better to lose her business than her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana baisse d'un ton.{/n} « Jae... Vous savez, Jae est vraiment quelqu'un de bien. Elle s'est fait un nom ici, à Castel. Elle est partie de rien, elle suit les règles tacites de l'endroit, elle ne s'en prend jamais aux plus faibles qu'elle, et en plus, elle a une descente incroyable... Franchement, elle mérite le respect. Mais malheureusement, elle a l'air de s'être attiré les foudres de Vladaym. Et puisque tous les deux... ou plutôt, tous les trois, on a des liens avec la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, elle est coincée. Jae devrait quitter Castel tant qu'elle le peut encore... Il vaut mieux perdre son business que la vie. »

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Bizim Jae... İyidir hoştur işte. Binliman'da namı aldı yürüdü. Sıfırdan geldi buralara. Bu âlemin raconuna uyar, kendinden güçsüzleri ezmez ve de sünger gibi içer. Saygı duymamak elde değil yani. İşin üzücü yanıysa, Vladaym'la arasının bozulması. Sonuçta ikisinin de, hatta üçümüzün de {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ile bağı olduğu için bu işten kurtulmanın yolu yok. Jae'ın fırsatı varken Binliman'ı terk etmesi lazım. Canını kaybetmektense varsın ekmek teknesini kaybetsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana drops her voice.{/n} "Jae... You know, Jae's pretty great. She's made a name for herself here on Footfall. She's a woman who came from nothing, she follows the unwritten rules of this place, she doesn't walk all over weaker folks, and she drinks like a fish to boot — there's lots to respect. The sad thing is, it looks like she's got on the wrong side of Vladaym. And since both of them — well, I guess all three of us — have ties to the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, there's no way out of this. Jae should get off Footfall while she still can — better to lose her business than her life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana, kısık sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Jae... Bir şey diyeyim mi, Jae gibisi yoktur. Binliman'da namını duyurmayı başardı. Sıfırdan geldi buralara. Burasının örfüne uyar, kendinden güçsüzleri ezmez ve de sünger gibi içki içer... Saygı duymamak elde değil. İşin üzücü yanı, Vladaym'la arasının bozulması. Sonuçta ikisinin de, hatta üçümüzün de mi desem, {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ile bağı olduğu için, bu işten kurtulmanın yolu yok. Jae fırsat varken Binliman'ı terk etmeli... Canını kaybetmektense, varsın ekmek teknesini kaybetsin."
